thread.title: Gomez, Underwood to perform at American Music Awards
thread.title_full: Gomez, Underwood to perform at American Music Awards

title: Gomez, Underwood to perform at American Music Awards
text: Add a message (optional) Success - Article sent! close FILE - In this Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, file photo, Selena Gomez performs on NBC's "Today" show at Rockefeller Plaza in New York. Gomez, Carrie Underwood and 5 Seconds of Summer will be performing at the American Music Awards, on Nov. 22, 2015, at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles. (Photo by Charles Sykes/Invision/AP, File) Associated Press FILE - In this Aug. 16, 2015, file photo, Luke Hemmings, from left, Ashton Irwin, Michael Clifford and Calum Hood, of 5 Seconds of Summer, arrive at the Teen Choice Awards at the Galen Center, in Los Angeles. Selena Gomez, Carrie Underwood and 5 Seconds of Summer will be performing at the American Music Awards, on Nov. 22, 2015, at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles. (Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP, File) Associated Press FILE - In this June 10, 2015, file photo, Carrie Underwood performs at the CMT Music Awards at Bridgestone Arena in Nashville, Tenn. Selena Gomez, Underwood and 5 Seconds of Summer will be performing at the American Music Awards, on Nov. 22, 2015, at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles. (Photo by Wade Payne/Invision/AP, File) Associated Press
